scripts.build: npm run build_lib & npm run build_app & npm run build_less
scripts.build_lib: browserify -r cerebellum -r q -r react/addons -r moment -r react-bootstrap -r lodash -u jquery -u underscore -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -o public/js/lib.js
scripts.build_app: browserify -x cerebellum -x q -x react/addons -x moment -x react-bootstrap -x lodash client.coffee -t coffee-reactify --extension='.coffee' -o public/js/app.js
scripts.watch_lib: watchify -r cerebellum -r q -r react/addons -r moment -r react-bootstrap -r lodash -u jquery -u underscore -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -o public/js/lib.js -v
scripts.watch_app: watchify -x cerebellum -x q -x react/addons -x moment -x react-bootstrap -x lodash client.coffee -d -t coffee-reactify --extension='.coffee' -o public/js/app.js -v
scripts.watch: npm run watch_app & npm run watch_lib & npm run watch_less
